remarks: Value of a function given in maps-to notation, with a slightly different sethood condition.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
fvmpt3.a $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
fvmpt3.b $e |- F = ( x e. D |-> B ) $.
fvmpt3i.c $e |- B e. _V $.
fvmpt3i $p |- ( A e. D -> ( F ` A ) = C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
